title: Tin’s Rapid Rally Crashes to a Halt After SHFE Probes Traders
description: Tin retreated from a record after the Shanghai Futures Exchange announced restrictions on positions for some clients suspected of not properly disclosing their ultimate ownership.
content: Tin retreated from a record after the Shanghai Futures Exchange announced restrictions on positions for some clients suspected of not properly disclosing their ultimate ownership.
